com.team08storyapp

Class PhotoController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.team08storyapp.PhotoController

  • public class PhotoController
extends java.lang.Object
    PhotoController is a controller class that is responsible for resizing (if needed), saving illustrations and update the current story and current story fragment.

    In current stage, PhotoController only provides a public method:

    • savePhoto(Uri pickedUri)
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0 November 8, 2013
    Author:
    Michele Paulichuk, Alice Wu, Ana Marcu, Jarrett Toll, Jiawei Shen

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PhotoController(Activity activity, Context context, Story currentStory, StoryFragment currentStoryFragment, int currentStoryFragmentIndex, FileHelper fHelper)
      Constructor of the PhotoController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int currentPosition()
      currentPosition function will return the index of the last photo in the gallery
      StoryFragment getCurrentStoryFragment()
      Retrieves the StoryFragment from the current fragment.
      Bitmap savePhoto(Uri pickedUri)
      savePhoto is the function where resizing, saving the illustration, and updating the current fragment are performed in order.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Detail

      • PhotoController

        public PhotoController(Activity activity,
               Context context,
               Story currentStory,
               StoryFragment currentStoryFragment,
               int currentStoryFragmentIndex,
               FileHelper fHelper)
        Constructor of the PhotoController takes in all the variables it needs and set them to corresponding variables to its own fields.
        Parameters:
        activity - an activity object
        context - a context object for writing files
        currentStory - currentStory, which will be updated after an image is added
        currentStoryFragment - the story fragment that needs to be updated
        currentStoryFragmentIndex - This is an index reference of the currentStoryFragment when updating. Since ArrayList.indexOf didn't work so well.
        fHelper - The FileHelper object that helps with saving images.

    • Method Detail

      • savePhoto

        public Bitmap savePhoto(Uri pickedUri)
        savePhoto is the function where resizing, saving the illustration, and updating the current fragment are performed in order.
        • resizing the illustration to 200 * 150 if it's larger than this dimension.
        • saving the image based on the information of its fragmentId storyId and current photo Id.
        • updating the story in local file system.
        Parameters:
        pickedUri - Uri reference to the image
        Returns:
        Bitmap object that is decoded from the Uri

      • currentPosition

        public int currentPosition()
        currentPosition function will return the index of the last photo in the gallery
        Returns:
        an integer value that represents the index of the last photo in the gallery

      • getCurrentStoryFragment

        public StoryFragment getCurrentStoryFragment()
        Retrieves the StoryFragment from the current fragment.
        Returns:
        on success desired current story fragment object.

      • setCurrentStoryFragment

        public void setCurrentStoryFragment(StoryFragment currentStoryFragment)
        Sets the current story fragment to currentStoryFragment.
        Parameters:
        currentStoryFragment - the current story fragment.
